entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain showers becoming mixed with a few flurries after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm and hail early this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
